item.title: Jake Sullivan traveled in secret to Kyiv in a trip aimed at reaffirming U.S. support for the beleaguered ally despite an impa... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: Jake Sullivan traveled in secret to Kyiv in a trip aimed at reaffirming U.S. support for the beleaguered ally despite an impasse in Congress over U.S. funding. "We are confident we will get this done, we will get this aid to Ukraine," Sullivan said

item.title: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Dvorichna, Synkivka, Petropavlivka and Berestove of Kharkiv region. Russian aviati... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Kupiansk direction Russian army shelled Dvorichna, Synkivka, Petropavlivka and Berestove of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Ivanivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: Ukrainian military had 67 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka, Zolotarivka of Luhansk region and Yampoliv... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: Ukrainian military had 67 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka, Zolotarivka of Luhansk region and Yampolivka, Terny, Rozdolivka, Vesele of Donetsk region, Bohdanivka, Ivanivske, Klischiyivka of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Semenivka, Tonenke, Pervomayske, Netaylove, Nevelske of Donetsk region, Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka, Vodyane, Urozhayne, Staromayorske of Donetsk region and Robotyne of Zaporizhzhia region, at the eastern bank of Dnipro river in Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: PM of Ukraine: Ukraine has received 2 billion Canadian dollars from Canada. Vital funds for our resilience. Grateful to Canad... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: PM of Ukraine: Ukraine has received 2 billion Canadian dollars from Canada. Vital funds for our resilience. Grateful to Canadian people, the Canadian Government, @JustinTrudeau, @cafreeland for your unwavering support of Ukraine in our fight for freedom. This is a significant investment in global security and peace.
